skills.name: Swarm of Crows
skills.description: [SP: 9][CD: 22s] Summons and deploys the weapon. For the next 10s, enemies within the AOE are marked. Marked enemies take 150% ATK of Ice DMG every 1s for 10s. Enemies who enter or leave the weapon AOE take 400% ATK of Ice DMG immediately. Effect has a 0.5s trigger interval.

skills.name: Angel of the Moon
skills.description: When charged attacks hit, deal 1,000 Physical DMG and 1,500 Ice DMG to target and nearby enemies. CD: 5.0s.
